text: 19.26 Sng 115.4, Ais 44.10-20, Jer 10.3, Apo 17.29, 2 Ti 1.15 Bɨ anɨb ak Pol pen ne apɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop yepɨs agɨl agup, Ñɨn mɨdup dɨl tap gɨpal okok, tap agnɨgep mel agup agak. Anɨb agek, taun Epesus binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl dɨl, Esiya plopens mɨdupsek binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl dɨl nɨgebal agak. Pol tap anɨb okok gup ak, nɨbi ke nepɨm agak.
